title: Deploy to production

requirements.text: Deploy the current application build (Version 17) to production on Internet Computer mainnet
acceptanceCriteria: Application is successfully deployed to Internet Computer mainnet
All backend canisters are running on mainnet
Frontend is accessible via mainnet canister URL
Service worker and PWA features are functional in production
All existing features (video streaming, authentication, favorites, watchlist) work correctly in production environment

constraints: Maintain all existing functionality during deployment
Preserve service worker cache strategy for offline support
Keep Internet Identity authentication configuration for mainnet
nonGoals: Making code changes or adding new features
Modifying the backend schema or data structures
Changing the UI design or user experience
